member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.BinderOptions
member.summary: Specifies options used by the .

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.BinderOptions.BindNonPublicProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the binder attempts to set all properties or only public properties.
member.value: if the binder attempts to set all non-read-only properties; if only public properties are set.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.BinderOptions.ErrorOnUnknownConfiguration
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether exceptions are thrown when converting a value or when a configuration key is found for which the provided model object doesn't have an appropriate property that matches the key's name.
member.value: if an is thrown with a description; if no exceptions are thrown. The default is .

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder
member.summary: Static helper class that allows binding strongly typed objects to configuration values.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.Get``1(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Attempts to bind the configuration instance to a new instance of type T. If this configuration section has a value, that will be used. Otherwise binding by matching property names against configuration keys recursively.
member.typeparam: The type of the new instance to bind.
member.returns: The new instance of T if successful, default(T) otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.Get``1(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.BinderOptions})
member.summary: Attempts to bind the configuration instance to a new instance of type T. If this configuration section has a value, that will be used. Otherwise binding by matching property names against configuration keys recursively.
member.typeparam: The type of the new instance to bind.
member.returns: The new instance of T if successful, default(T) otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.Get(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.Type)
member.summary: Attempts to bind the configuration instance to a new instance of type T. If this configuration section has a value, that will be used. Otherwise binding by matching property names against configuration keys recursively.
member.param: The type of the new instance to bind.
member.returns: The new instance if successful, null otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.Get(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.Type,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.BinderOptions})
member.summary: Attempts to bind the configuration instance to a new instance of type T. If this configuration section has a value, that will be used. Otherwise binding by matching property names against configuration keys recursively.
member.param: The type of the new instance to bind.
member.returns: The new instance if successful, null otherwise.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.Bind(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to bind the given object instance to the configuration section specified by the key by matching property names against configuration keys recursively.
member.param: The key of the configuration section to bind.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.Bind(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to bind the given object instance to configuration values by matching property names against configuration keys recursively.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.Bind(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.Object,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.BinderOptions})
member.summary: Attempts to bind the given object instance to configuration values by matching property names against configuration keys recursively.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.GetValue``1(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the value with the specified key and converts it to type T.
member.typeparam: The type to convert the value to.
member.param: The key of the configuration section's value to convert.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.GetValue``1(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Extracts the value with the specified key and converts it to type T.
member.typeparam: The type to convert the value to.
member.param: The key of the configuration section's value to convert.
The default value to use if no value is found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.GetValue(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Extracts the value with the specified key and converts it to the specified type.
member.param: The type to convert the value to.
The key of the configuration section's value to convert.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.GetValue(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.Type,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Extracts the value with the specified key and converts it to the specified type.
member.param: The type to convert the value to.
The key of the configuration section's value to convert.
The default value to use if no value is found.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.ResetPropertyValue(System.Reflection.PropertyInfo,System.Object,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.BinderOptions)
member.summary: Reset the property value to the value from the property getter. This is useful for properties that have a getter or setters that perform some logic changing the object state.
member.param: The instance to reset the property on.
member.remarks: This method doesn't do any configuration binding. It just resets the property value to the value from the property getter. This method called only when creating an instance using a primary constructor with parameters names match properties names.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.CreateInstance(System.Type,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.BinderOptions,System.Reflection.ParameterInfo[]@)
member.summary: Create an instance of the specified type.
member.param: The type to create an instance of.
The configuration to bind to the instance.
The parameters of the constructor used to create the instance.
member.exception: If the type cannot be created.
member.remarks: constructorParameters will not be null only when using a constructor with a parameters which get their values from the configuration This happen when using types having properties match the constructor parameter names. `record` types are an example. In such cases we need to carry the parameters list to avoid binding the properties again during BindProperties.

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_CannotActivateAbstractOrInterface
member.summary: Cannot create instance of type '{0}' because it is either abstract or an interface.

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_CannotBindToConstructorParameter
member.summary: Cannot create instance of type '{0}' because one or more parameters cannot be bound to. Constructor parameters cannot be declared as in, out, or ref. Invalid parameters are: '{1}'

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_ConstructorParametersDoNotMatchProperties
member.summary: Cannot create instance of type '{0}' because one or more parameters cannot be bound to. Constructor parameters must have corresponding properties. Fields are not supported. Missing properties are: '{1}'

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_FailedBinding
member.summary: Failed to convert configuration value '{0}' at '{1}' to type '{2}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_FailedToActivate
member.summary: Failed to create instance of type '{0}'.

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_GeneralErrorWhenBinding
member.summary: '{0}' was set and binding has failed. The likely cause is an invalid configuration value.

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_MissingConfig
member.summary: '{0}' was set on the provided {1}, but the following properties were not found on the instance of {2}: {3}

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_MissingPublicInstanceConstructor
member.summary: Cannot create instance of type '{0}' because it is missing a public instance constructor.

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_MultipleParameterizedConstructors
member.summary: Cannot create instance of type '{0}' because it has multiple public parameterized constructors.

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_ParameterBeingBoundToIsUnnamed
member.summary: Cannot create instance of type '{0}' because one or more parameters are unnamed.

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_ParameterHasNoMatchingConfig
member.summary: Cannot create instance of type '{0}' because parameter '{1}' has no matching config. Each parameter in the constructor that does not have a default value must have a corresponding config entry.

member.name: P:System.SR.Error_UnsupportedMultidimensionalArray
member.summary: Cannot create instance of type '{0}' because multidimensional arrays are not supported.
